name: Love in Oasis
description:
Made for Otome jam 2022

 This game is set in the zombie apocalypse and will contain topics and visuals not suitable for all. Remember to prioritise your mental health first and foremost. 

!!!Content warning!!!: Gore, Death/Murder, Mild sexual themes, Use of alcohol, Strong language, Violence, Trauma (abuse, bullying, toxic relationships).

The game features:

3 Love interests - each with their own struggles to discover.  (Currently only 2 are available - William and Christopher!)

Multiple endings - 5 different endings for each Love interest.

Multiple side characters with their own stories to discover.

Nameable MC - So you can call her whatever you want!

Choose specialization to flavour the MC - Will you be a Nurse, Scavenger, Builder, Engineer, Farmer or Cook? 

Lots of words.

Main Characters:

You'll play as a Nameable MC. Together with 10 year old Kira you venture towards a secure settlement that you've heard of down south. But you should’ve known it wouldn’t be a walk in the park to get there… Will you find romance or heartbreak wherever you end up?

Love Interests:

 

(N/A) Axel the carefree jokester - William the stoic leader - Christopher the shy softie 

Side Characters:

              

       

+ a few more.
